rows.label: tlk46400071_02_msg0001
rows.name:
Fan-sama's funerary service was
so solemn and grand...

rows.label: tlk46400071_02_msg0002
rows.name:
I will probably never forget her
beauty, nor the pain of losing
such a pure and noble soul.

rows.label: tlk46400071_02_msg0003
rows.name:
I wonder what will become of Acedia
without Fan-sama...

rows.label: tlk46400071_02_msg0004
rows.name:
I hope that the peace we enjoy will
continue, but I cannot help but worry...
